import "./post.css"; import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons"; import {Users} from "../../dummyData" import { useState } from "react"; export default function Post({post}) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like) return (
u.id===post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="postProfileImg" /> {Users.filter(u=>u.id===post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like}
{post.comment} comments
); }
